Pictures: Seahawks 24, Patriots 23

Seahawks defeat Patriots

(John Froschauer/AP)
The Seattle Seahawks scored a touchdown with 87 seconds to play in their come-from-behind win over the Patriots, who scored just 6 second-half points on Sunday.

Content from Twitter

MBTA bystanders rescue woman from tracks at Kendall Square station

Witnesses said they were astounded by the swift reaction of others to save a 54-year-old woman from Minnesota who had fallen onto the tracks. (Boston Globe)

Missing Methuen boy found

Methuen Police located the 12-year-old boy in Lawrence. He had been reported missing on Friday after walking away from his foster home in Methuen. (Globe)

Official: Skydiver breaks speed of sound

Felix Baumgartner landed after a 24-mile jump today in a plunge that officials said made him the first skydiver to fall faster than the speed of sound. (AP)

CDC confirms 4 N.H. patients have fungal infections tied to Framingham facility

Three patients have fungal meningitis and a fourth person has a peripheral joint infection. All of the cases are related to apparently tainted steroids produced by a Framingham facility. (Boston Globe)
